name: The Midnight Runner (Aeon_Viper)
description:
Controls -

Left mouse click/ spacebar - jump

Left mouse hold/ spacebar hold - Go up (One section of level only)

Reach the end of the level and escape.

Do you think that the difficulty changes as the music changes?

I am aware of a bug within the game. The bug is if you try to retry the level from the fail screen, the game can break which doesn't allow you see what is going on in the level.
